welcome_message_body: Welcome to Jiguani, Cuba! Get ready to experience the charming small-town atmosphere, rich culture, and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at C.M. de Cespedes Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at C.M. de Cespedes Airport handles all cargo flights and shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frank Pais Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter flights and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name and password can be obtained at the information desk.
